text: Arau sihamte (jahannamibilake) sihamtara chalaboraka sudhiba, ‘kiya tomaloke amara biraud'dhe saksya dila’? Chalaborae ka’ba, ‘allahe'i amaka bakasakti diche, yi satta'i sakaloke bakasakti diche. Teraemi tomalokaka prathamabara srsti karaiche arau te'omra ocarate'i tomaloka pratyarartita ha’ba’
